
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in Yandex and called "ya"
# (https://github.com/yandex/yatool).
#
# Configuration files of ya build system are usually named ya.make. If ya.make file is present
# at the root of the repository, then this repository supports ya build. 
# 
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build 
# system may be rejected.

add_executable(ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider)


target_link_libraries(ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  cpp-client-ydb_scheme
  cpp-client-ydb_table
  api-grpc
)

target_link_options(ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)

target_sources(ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/tests/functional/sdk/cpp/sdk_credprovider/dummy_provider_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
  YDB_DRIVER_BINARY=ydb/apps/ydbd/ydbd
)


target_allocator(ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

vcs_info(ydb-tests-functional-sdk-cpp-sdk_credprovider)
